text: Autumn Sonata (, ) is a 1978 Swedish West German drama movie directed by Ingmar Bergman. Starring Ingrid Bergman in her final movie role, Liv Ullmann, Lena Nyman, Halvar Björk, Marianne Aminoff, Arne Bang-Hansen, Gunnar Björnstrand, Erland Josephson, Georg Løkkeberg, Mimi Pollak, Linn Ullmann. It was distributed by Constantin Film. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1978 drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ingmar Bergman
title: Autumn Sonata
